hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'The dust in the cause of Allah and the smoke of Hell will never be combined in a slave's lungs, and stinginess and faith can never be combined in a slave's heart

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَنْ عَمِلَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَلَى قَدَمِهِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The One Who Strives In The Cause Of Allah On His Feet
